item.title: MIUI OS2.0.205.0.VOOMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G / POCO X7 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G / POCO X7 Global

Codename: malachite

Version: OS2.0.205.0.VOOMIXM | 15.0

Size: 9.6 GB

MD5: 99c9e2b80b70bb3cef7137e36c50b52c

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Fix: Unexpected reboots occurred
Fix: Items were displayed incorrectly in some cases
Updated the security patch to August 2025. Increased system security.
